channel.title: reflection on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in reflection on Barefoot Rob

item.title: Brighter than the sun
item.description: ##18:54 Wednesday 14 January 2015 JST## (A few days ago,) near Kawasaki station, I noticed a reallly bright spot in the middle of the intersection: sunlight reflected from a nearby building. It actually appeared that the reflected light was more concentrated than regular sunlight; I guess the building is slightly curved.

item.title: reflection of jack
item.description: ##21 November 2014 This is (an image of (a reflection of)) Jack, sunning in the sun on our balcony.

item.title: Chapter this morning
item.description:
##08:32 Thursday 20 November 2014 JST On the way to my lesson this morning, I snapped a snap of this tree inside the lobby of the building.
Onoue joined the lesson today.
